alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 3:21AM EST until November 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Isolated amounts up to 8 inches. * WHERE...Herkimer County * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most persistent bands of snow are expected this morning into the early evening mainly north of Interstate 90 to around Routes 8 and 365, where locally higher totals up to 8 inches are possible. Snowfall rates may reach an inch an hour briefly at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
